mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vacation (code, start, end, content, employee_id) VALUES (#{code}, #{start}, #{end}, #{content}, #{employeeId})
mapper.select: SELECT v.*, GROUP_CONCAT(vh.date ORDER BY vh.date SEPARATOR ',') AS date FROM vacation v JOIN vacation_detail_date vh ON v.idx = vh.vacation_idx WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} and date between DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-01') and LAST_DAY(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) and approval_status in ('W', 'R', 'C') GROUP BY v.idx, v.content, v.start, v.end, vh.vacation_idx ORDER BY v.idx;
SELECT * FROM vacation WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} and approval_status = 'A'

SELECT v.*, vh.vacation_idx, GROUP_CONCAT(vh.date ORDER BY vh.date SEPARATOR ',') AS date FROM vacation v JOIN vacation_detail_date vh ON v.idx = vh.vacation_idx WHERE approval_status = 'A' and date between DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), interval -6 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') and LAST_DAY(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), interval 6 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d')) GROUP BY v.idx, v.content, v.start, v.end, vh.vacation_idx ORDER BY v.idx;
